short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate crypto price based on market cap.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cryptolator - Simple Cryptocurrency Price Calculator

Ever wondered what the price of a cryptocurrency would be if its market cap reached a certain value? Cryptolator is the perfect tool for quickly and easily calculating the price of any cryptocurrency based on the market cap you enter.

Key Features:

Real-Time Data: Instantly fetch up-to-date circulating supply and market cap data for any cryptocurrency from CoinGecko.
Autocomplete Search: Easily find your desired cryptocurrency using our intuitive autocomplete search feature. Just start typing the coin name or symbol, and select from the suggestions.
Market Cap Calculator: Enter a market cap value, and Cryptolator will calculate the estimated price of the selected cryptocurrency.
Theme Switcher: Switch between light and dark themes to suit your preference, or let Cryptolator automatically adjust based on the time of day.
Modern Design: Enjoy a clean, modern interface that is both aesthetically pleasing and easy to navigate.
How It Works:

Search for a Coin: Begin typing the name or symbol of the cryptocurrency you want to look up. Cryptolator will provide a list of matching coins for you to select from.
Fetch Coin Data: Once you've selected a coin, Cryptolator will automatically fetch the latest circulating supply and market cap data.
Calculate the Price: Enter the market cap value you want to use, and Cryptolator will calculate and display the estimated price of the cryptocurrency.
Cryptolator is your go-to tool for quick and accurate cryptocurrency price calculations based on market cap. Download now and start exploring the potential prices of your favorite cryptocurrencies!
